name: Kemco RPG Selection Vol. 1
summary:
Kemco RPG Selection Vol. 1 is a bundle of multiple games in the J-RPG genre.

Includes:
• Asdivine Hearts - Beautiful hand-drawn visuals and a story of epic proportions bring a fantasy turn-based RPG, to the forefront of console gaming!
• Revenant Saga - Become a Revenant and find the truth beyond revenge in this gothic fantasy RPG with stunning 3D battles!
• Antiquia Lost - An authentic RPG of a journey with a girl made of slime! Enjoy fluid 2D turn-based battles!
• Dragon Sinker - Join forces with elves and dwarves, and slay the evil dragon, Wyrmvarg in a retro-style fantasy RPG!
